item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, April 11, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. US fires Greenland base commander after JD Vance visit
2. China increases retaliatory tariffs on US imports to 125%
3. JPMorgan chief Dimon warns of ‘considerable turbulence’ in US economy
4. EU could tax Big Tech if Trump trade talks fail, says von der Leyen
5. [Opinion] If Trump is trying to suppress China, he’s going about it all wrong
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, April 11, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
